title: Unpopular Opinion: Water is needed for survival
body:
I know this will be downvoted to hell by Team Magma mains but we really need watrer for survival.
God plz buff water.

replies.body: Water is perfectly balanced as it is, I think we all remember what happened the last time God over-buffed water
Okay I wasn't sure If posting the original post is worth the shitposting but this response made it 100% worth.

God, I hope we never get another ark meta again.

Freaking ark mains and their obsession with their duo lanes.

That's the problem with water - it is inherently perfectly balanced, but once buffed, it gets fed so damn quickly.

https://pre00.deviantart.net/1221/th/pre/i/2014/168/f/2/the_big_one_by_grivetart-d7mrqvp.jpg

_I just noticed...nice nick btw._ ^^
Oh yah, the Noah incident :/
The problem with water is its capacity to snowball.
I didn't think water could snowball if the lane is frozen?

> [{quoted}](name=LugiaPaladin,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6XTgoFRE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-05T19:04:40.690+0000)
>
> Water is perfectly balanced as it is, I think we all remember what happened the last time God over-buffed water

I reckon the Beta release of water was overtuned and was a lot worse than Beta Xin Zhao.
Where is Reddit gold when you need it.
Don't listen to him. He is an undercover Team Aqua supporter and tries to flood the entire planet!

> [{quoted}](name=Aory,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6XTgoFRE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-05T19:04:58.709+0000)
>
> Don't listen to him. He is an undercover Team Aqua supporter and tries to flood the entire planet!

There is a team Aqua now too? I used to live in a work where there was a Team Rocket and thats it.
You are missing out on a world where you get to wage war on environmentalists.  I mean pretty overzealous environmentalists but the story concept is still pretty damn funny.
Team Aqua and Team Magma have been around since like 2002 lmao
I don't recall Scarra or any high level player saying anything about water. You some kind of silver scrub? Git gud.
I don't think water is meta right now? I've literally only seen water once this month and it had very little impact.
Bullshit, Pepsi and Cola are mainstream right now, even Milk has higher pick rate than water. Water is under-powered as fuck. Even {{champion:267}} doesn't use it anymore
Yeah she switched to Sprite a while ago.

I laughed so hard at this! ^^

Not only am I a Nami main, I prefer Sprite over most other sodas too (it somewhat explain things for me). Thank you so much for bringing me such words of gold this late at night. :D

https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/723/810/aa2.gif

>Water is under-powered as fuck. Even {{champion:267}}  doesn't use it anymore

So...you're saying Surf needs a buff?

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/pokemon/images/7/74/Caesar_Surf.png

_It may have been a different patch, but I believe Noah would disagree with that._

I disagree water needs a Nerf how come we depend on it for our survival water is too powerful! 
And water can kill us in humongous amounts...
I think I've made my point.
Unpopular opinion: My opinion is popular.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6XTgoFRE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-08-05T18:57:29.294+0000)
>
> Unpopular opinion: My opinion is popular.

pity upvote
Screw you I'm going to live off of Coconut Cordial for the rest of my life. Unless you want to rock the boat, that is...
7.8/10 Too much water

Neither

Rayquaza beat both you suckers
By screaming once

> [{quoted}](name=Primaquarius,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6XTgoFRE,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-08-05T19:59:06.661+0000)
>
> By screaming once

It was a majestic scream tho



Gotta admit

> [{quoted}](name=BrokenRayquaza,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6XTgoFRE,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-08-05T19:16:49.724+0000)
>
> Neither
> 
> Rayquaza beat both you suckers

Doesn't even need to Mega-Evolve smh

Water needs buffs like Ahri mains think Ahri needs buffs.  

Water already covers like 3/4 of the planet lol
If water truly is that powerful and has as much presence as you claim, then why is the planet itself called "Earth"? Obviously, land is far more powerful.
I only drink sweet tea, you lie!
https://imgflip.com/i/2fdnbv
NOOOOOOOOOOOO {{sticker:sg-janna}}
im so lost right now
Reminds me of all the "unpopular opinions" on 9gag
I rate it nice/meme
the only team i like is team draven
Nah man, team soda mid all the way.
Screw Team Magma, Team Aqua is where its at.  I mean come on, they're pirates.  Meanwhile we got team hoodie and arrogant businessman on the other side.
I really don't understand why table water is paid content. How long will Riot just sit and watch?
Water is the single most dangerous substance on Earth, just look at the death stats.

> [{quoted}](name=FilDaFunk,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6XTgoFRE,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2018-08-06T00:28:39.431+0000)
>
> Water is the single most dangerous substance on Earth, just look at the death stats.

Rito pls nerf T-rex oh wait you killed it.
God already buffed Iceland's water by making the tap water drinkable, yeah, thatÂ´'s right. Ever been to this country? The water being sold in stores here are scams.
yes
Finally an actual unpopular opinion.
Water is fine at the moment. Right now, mankind is mini-buffing fire patch by patch, and soon the water mains stuck in the poles will have its meta.

Or you know use water to set out fire?
It checks out you know "shits on fire yo!"......soo before we get a flood pls just set the fking forestfire out 1st
Nice satire.
